title: Solution: Smoke test infrastructure failures
description: Solution attempt: Fixed all 5 critical smoke test issues: 1) Updated text assertions from 'iD Comedy' to 'Stand Up Sydney', 2) Fixed port from 8081 to 8080, 3) Fixed Puppeteer headless configuration, 4) Installed Chrome binary via 'npx puppeteer browsers install chrome', 5) Fixed TypeScript error handling with proper error instance checking. All 6 smoke tests now passing 100%. Test file: /root/agents/tests/smoke.test.ts
